Footnotes
a CAS numbers are Chemical Abstracts Service registration
numbers assigned to specific chemicals, isomers, or mixtures of chemicals. Some
isomers or mixtures that are covered by the standards do not have CAS numbers
assigned to them. The requirements of this Part apply to all of the chemicals
listed, whether CAS numbers have been assigned or not. b No CAS number(s) have been assigned to this chemical, its

236.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
